prompts: Create an aquatic Pokemon with a majestic blue body and striking fins.
I want a legendary Pokemon that can control the ocean with its powerful presence.
Generate a water-type Pokemon with a sleek design and impressive size.
Make a mythical creature that lives in the depths of the sea, surrounded by mysteries.
Imagine a Pokemon with a deep blue color and unique traits that make it stand out.
Design a powerful water Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean.
Show me a Pokemon that represents the force of nature and the beauty of the sea.
